scripts.lint-staged:acs-chat-adapter:eslint: cd packages && cd acs-chat-adapter && npm run eslint
scripts.lint-staged:acs-chat-adapter:prettier: cd packages && cd acs-chat-adapter && npm run prettier
scripts.lint-staged:api:eslint: cd packages && cd api && npm run eslint
scripts.lint-staged:api:prettier: cd packages && cd api && npm run prettier
scripts.lint-staged:bundle:eslint: cd packages && cd bundle && npm run eslint
scripts.lint-staged:bundle:prettier: cd packages && cd bundle && npm run prettier
scripts.lint-staged:component:eslint: cd packages && cd component && npm run eslint
scripts.lint-staged:component:prettier: cd packages && cd component && npm run prettier
scripts.lint-staged:core:eslint: cd packages && cd core && npm run eslint
scripts.lint-staged:core:prettier: cd packages && cd core && npm run prettier
scripts.lint-staged:directlinespeech:eslint: cd packages && cd directlinespeech && npm run eslint
scripts.lint-staged:directlinespeech:prettier: cd packages && cd directlinespeech && npm run prettier
scripts.lint-staged:isomorphic-react:eslint: cd packages && cd isomorphic-react && npm run eslint
scripts.lint-staged:isomorphic-react:prettier: cd packages && cd isomorphic-react && npm run prettier
scripts.lint-staged:isomorphic-react-dom:eslint: cd packages && cd isomorphic-react-dom && npm run eslint
scripts.lint-staged:isomorphic-react-dom:prettie: cd packages && cd isomorphic-react-dom && npm run prettier
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --raw "serve" "serve -p 5001 -c serve-test.json" "lerna run --ignore acs-app --ignore acs-server --ignore playground --parallel --stream start"
scripts.start:docker: npm run start:docker:build && npm run start:docker:up
scripts.tableflip: npx lerna clean --yes --concurrency 8 && npx rimraf node_modules && npm ci && npm run bootstrap -- --concurrency 8
scripts.watch: echo NPM script "watch" has been replaced with "start".
